name: eSavV Technologies
tag_list: software-development, web-software-application-development, mobile-application-development, information-technology-consultant, apple-approved-app-developer, iphone-apps, android-apps, tablet-apps, enterprise-mobile-application--development, consumer-mobil
overview:
eSavV Technologies is a niche technology firm with our corporate office in Lincoln, Rhode Island. eSavV is a niche team with highly specialized skills in all facets of enterprise mobile, web and custom software solutions. We also provide IT Staffing services for corporations looking for highly skilled resources onsite.

Our team is comprised of highly skilled individuals including PhD engineers, certified enterprise software architects, certified software testers, industry leaders and authors, award-winning UI/UX designers and experienced project managers.

We do not offshore any of our work, so your mobile and web software solutions not only help your organization, they also help our economy.

We are certified, fully insured and trusted by Columbia University, United Nations affiliates, United Health Group affiliates, small businesses and enterprise corporations across the country.

Our work has been featured in news publications, business magazines, universities and technical conferences including TED.

Call our offices today at 888-316-6303 or 401-305-3420 for a consultation. Or email us at operations@eSavV.com.

Specialties:

Enterprise Mobile Smartphone & Tablet Applications, MAM-Mobile Appliaction Management Solutions, Advanced Web-Based Applications& Software, Enterprise System Integration, Custom Software Solutions, Service Oreinted Architecture, Web Service Design & Development
